tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE HumanRightsIncidents (
    incident_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_date TIMESTAMP,
    location VARCHAR,
    description TEXT,
    reported_by VARCHAR,
    incident_type VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE HumanRightsIncidents (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE AidOrganizations (
    organization_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    organization_name VARCHAR(100),
    contact_email VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE ConflictZones (
    zone_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    zone_name VARCHAR(100),
    country VARCHAR(50),
    threat_level INT
)

CREATE TABLE incidents (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR,
    type VARCHAR,
    description TEXT,
    date_reported DATE
);

CREATE TABLE victims (
    victim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id INT,
    name VARCHAR,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR,
    status VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE aid_organizations (
    organization_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR,
    location VARCHAR,
    contact_person VARCHAR,
    contact_number VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE incidents (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_date DATE,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT,
  reported_by VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE victims (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_id INT,
  victim_name VARCHAR(100),
  age INT,
  gender CHAR(1),
  ethnicity VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE aid_organizations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  org_name VARCHAR(150),
  contact_person VARCHAR(100),
  phone_number VARCHAR(20),
  email VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE aid_requests (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_id INT,
  organization_id INT,
  request_date DATE,
  status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE aid_deliveries (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  request_id INT,
  delivered_date DATE,
  quantity INT,
  notes TEXT
)
